attributes.action: scrap the Official 2012 Olympics logo and have another one commissioned in its place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not think that the time and public money spent on the creation of the logo represents a good investment and we feel that, fundamentally, the design misses the overall point of the event; it misrepresents the passion and national pride behind the occasion and does not represent the hopes and ambitions of the people of Great Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
